grandeconomy.killed_balance: You were killed, your balance is now: %s
grandeconomy.killer_balance: You just killed someone, your balance is now: %s
commands.grandeconomy.common.console: %s can only be used by players.
commands.grandeconomy.common.insufficien: You don't have enough %s to do that.
commands.grandeconomy.convert.descriptio: Converts what you're holding into currency.
commands.grandeconomy.convert.success: You have exchanged %s %s for %s each, earning a total of %s. Your balance is now %s.
commands.grandeconomy.convert.failure: The item you are holding has no value.
commands.grandeconomy.pay.description: Pay a player money from your account.
commands.grandeconomy.pay.negative: You cannot pay someone negative amount.
commands.grandeconomy.wallet.add.descrip: The admin command to put money in a player's account.
commands.grandeconomy.wallet.take.descri: The admin command to take money from a player's account.
commands.grandeconomy.wallet.set.descrip: The admin command set the balance of a player's account.
commands.grandeconomy.wallet.balance.des: The admin command to see the balance of a player's account.
commands.grandeconomy.wallet.negative: You cannot do this because it would set the balance of %s below zero.
text.config.grandeconomy.title: Grand Economy Config
text.config.grandeconomy.global.desc: Settings that work regardless of bridging.
text.config.grandeconomy.option.pvpMoney: Percent of money to transfer to a player's killer.
Flat amount of money to transfer to a player's killer.
text.config.grandeconomy.bridging.desc: Settings for working with other economies.
text.config.grandeconomy.option.economyB: Which economy to bridge to, if any.
This means Grand Economy and all mods using it will use the target's currency.
There are currently no options built in.
The game will crash if you choose one that is not loaded.
text.config.grandeconomy.option.enforceN: Makes sure account balances cannot go below zero.
Useful if the bridged economy doesn't properly prevent negative balances.
text.config.grandeconomy.nativeEconomy.d: Settings for the built in economy.
text.config.grandeconomy.option.basicInc: Give each player currency every day they log in.
Amount to be given to a player each day.
text.config.grandeconomy.option.maxIncom: The max number of days since last login
the player will be paid basic income for.
